leadership.title: Founding Director
leadership.name: Apar Gupta
leadership.desc: He is a lawyer and is the Asia Policy Director at Access Now. Raman was also one of the founders of the SaveTheInternet movement and advises IFF towards fulfilling its mission and objectives

leadership.title: Board Co-chair and Trustee
leadership.name: Karthik Balakrishnan
leadership.desc: He is a software engineer at Insider.in and has built most of IFF’s tech assets. Karthik also provides guidance on technical queries and also implements fixes on IFF’s main website as well as other campaign websites and campaigns

leadership.title: Chair and Trustee
leadership.name: Rachita Taneja
leadership.desc: She is an artist, activist and the co-founder of Jhatkaa.org. Rachita is also the creator of Sanitary Panels. She advises IFF on creating and running public campaigns given her previous expertise in the area and also oversees matters of organisational structuring

leadership.title: Co-Chair and Trustee
leadership.name: Aravind Ravi-Sulekha
leadership.desc: Software engineer and entrepreneur at Nektar.ai. He is a co-founder and trustee and broadly oversees projects being run by volunteers. His experience with tech startups has provided IFF with a deeper understanding of the technology sector
